name: API Vault
description: Cross-platform app designed specifically for engineering students to securely manage and store API keys, aiming to reduce development time for small apps and prototypes. It features API key grouping, dynamic filtering, sorting, and real-time search to simplify key management. Security is enhanced through integrated Two-Factor Authentication using the Twilio API.

name: Diversyfinance
description: Full-Stack app that helps users overcome language barriers in personal finance by offering a user-friendly chatbot that summarizes and translates financial information into any language. The app automatically gathers, updates, and maintains financial services data from major institutions, providing users with up-to-date information tailored to their needs.
